basics.name: Ben Gadbois
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Full stack developer, with server side focus. I like to move fast and build things.

work.summary: Music and speech recognition and understanding platform
highlights: Designed and implemented systems that clean and manage a unique blend of searchable data, including audio, metadata, and traditional text-based content. Implemented core backend parts in C++, web interfaces in PHP + JS, and automation with Bash and Jenkins.
Developed and maintained a realtime audio streaming authentication and routing proxy. Built for the HTTP and Websockets speech API. Server implemented in Go, backed by MySQL and Memcache.
Migrated multiple large projects from SVN to Git, setup continuous integration, created fast and safe workflow, and helped other team members ramp up.
Redesigned Download.com's incoming software updating process, improving performance by introducing multithreading and adding greater crash tolerance.
Implemented new features in Java, used Spring for configuration, Hibernate with databases, and Apache ActiveMQ to handle workers.

awards.title: SF Music Hackathon Winner
awards.summary: Best use of Musicgraph's and Musicxmatch's API. 24hr project that uses your tweets to identify the artist whose lyrics match your speech style.
